It's not an AP 2.5 game .I can confirm that because games like fable 3 , black op's and halo reach won't work on my Xbox . This game on the other hand works . I think the whole AP 2.5 thing was just an experiment in which Microsoft failed .
Anyway , NO AP 2.5 . Lets just keep our fingers crossed and hope Gears of War 3 isn't AP 2.5 protected :)

@kiraburu -This game is definitely better than the first game . The graphics are stunning and car models have a lot of detail .At times the game does get a little "toooo" realistic , it tends to get in the way of the fun . Beside that, it's an amazing game .
